name: Follow The Neon
description:
You find yourself in a strange lab, the only light you see is of a neon sign pointing to the exit of this room, shall you follow it? 
Set the arrow signs to point the player to the exit of each room in this atmospheric puzzler. 

This game is a submission to the Amaze Me Game Jam GMS with the theme NEON. This is the first game I made with a dynamic lighting system, I used GMS2's shaders and blend modes to give the game that sweet neon aesthetic.

There is so much that I would like to add to this game but I felt this was a good place to stop for the jam.

Coming in the future:
- Redo to the majority of the art (I spent so much time on the lighting system I barely  had time to make the art)
- Colorblind mode (The game is highly dependent on color so it only seems logical, until then: I am very sorry)
- Add extra levels and different areas

If you find any bugs or have any kind of feedback either post it in the comments. all feedback is welcome.
